document_data.name: Lita
document_data.mainbody: '''Lita''' was an [[elf]] shopkeeper inhabiting the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the lateâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Lita owned [[Lita's Equipment]], a general goods shop located in the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] on [[Teshwave Street]].
document_data.History: She claimed to have been an [[adventurer]], but her company was killed so she decided to settle in Zhentil Keep where she used the money from selling her friends' equipment to open her shop.
document_data.Possessions: Lita wore an ''[[amulet of proof against detection and location]]''.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Lita was actually a [[werefox]] who killed her own adventuring company.
